title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 570.5 - Pre-existing Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 570.5 - Pre-existing Facilities

State Regulations

All pre-existing LNG facilities may continue to operate
without a permit so long as the facility remains in compliance with the
provisions of 570.l(d)(5). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
570.5

Adopted
by

New

York State Register February 11, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 06, eff. 2/26/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
